content: क्षीण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [क्षि-क्त] {@--1@} Thin, emaciated, waned, become lean, diminished, worn away, expended; भार्यां क्षीणेषु वित्तेषु (जानीयात्) <ls>H. 1. 72</ls>; so क्षीणः. शशी; क्षीणे पुण्ये मर्त्यलोके विशंति. {@--2@} Slender, delicate. {@--3@} Small, little. {@--4@} Poor, miserable. {@--5@} Powerless, weak. {@--6@} Wasted away, decreased, lost, diminished. {@--7@} Dead, destroyed; अक्षीणभक्तिः क्षीणेऽपि नंदे <ls>Mu. 2. 21</ls>, {@--8@} Injured, broken, torn.
